price: Kuma ka sani, abin sani kawai, abin da kuka sãmi* ganĩma daga wani abu, to, lalle ne Allah Yanã da humusinsa kuma da Manzo, kuma da mãsu zumunta, da marãyu da miskĩnai da ɗan hanya, idan kun kasance kun yi ĩmãni da Allah da abin da Muka saukar a kan bãwanMu a Rãnar Rarrabẽwa, a Rãnar da jama'a biyu suka haɗu, kuma Allah ne, a kan kõwane abu, Mai ĩkon yi.
arabic: ۞ وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّمَا غَنِمۡتُم مِّن شَيۡءٖ فَأَنَّ لِلَّهِ خُمُسَهُۥ وَلِلرَّسُولِ وَلِذِي ٱلۡقُرۡبَىٰ وَٱلۡيَتَٰمَىٰ وَٱلۡمَسَٰكِينِ وَٱبۡنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ إِن كُنتُمۡ ءَامَنتُم بِٱللَّهِ وَمَآ أَنزَلۡنَا عَلَىٰ عَبۡدِنَا يَوۡمَ ٱلۡفُرۡقَانِ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡتَقَى ٱلۡجَمۡعَانِۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٌ
footnotes: * Daga farkon sũrar har zuwa a nan, anã bayãnin cewa ganĩmar Badar bã ta kõwa ba ce fãce Allah da ManzonSa; to, a nan Yanã bayãyin yadda zã a raba dũkiyar, kuma wannan rabon, ya zama sunna ga dukkan dũkiyar ganĩma da Musulmi suka sãmu da yãƙi kõ hari.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-iʿ'lamū annamā ghanim'tum min shayin fa-anna lillahi khumusahu walilrrasūli walidhī al-qur'bā wal-yatāmā wal-masākīni wa-ib'ni al-sabīli in kuntum āmantum bil-lahi wamā anzalnā ʿalā ʿabdinā yawma al-fur'qāni yawma al-taqā al-jamʿāni wal-lahu ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
